channel.title: reflection on Mason Zhang
channel.description: Recent content in reflection on Mason Zhang

item.title: College
item.description: This morning, I woke up at 4:30 to drop my family off at the airport. I didn’t get much sleep last night - I wasn’t really tired until 11, and then I stayed up for another hour when the Kawhi/PG news broke. It was a 45 minute drive to the airport and too early for anyone to feel like talking much. Spent some time hugging everyone and saying goodbye, and that was it.
